course_title: Food and Culture in East Asia
course_description: In this course, we will place food under analytic scrutiny and explore the variegated histories of food in East Asia. We will interrogate the different ways of imagining, understanding, and defining Asian foods and explore how human relationships to food in East Asia have changed over time.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4363, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 2:30-5:15p, Instructor: C. Zhou, Status: Closed
